description: Worked on developing a zomato like search and discovery website.
Was one of the chief UI/UX designers and aimed at creating a responsive web design
As a college intern, it was a huge learning experience that started my journey in software development
Worked on Database Management and Web Developement. Interacted and supported global clients by trobleshooting and analysing root causes at various development stages.
Successfully accomplished the task of developing a centralised timesheet for better Resource Management
It helped me get an international exposure and gave me confidence in pursuing my software development career
Built a responsive website and used Google Technologies to do analytics and to optimise visibilty. Also made use of Open Graph to integrate the website to Facebook and Twitter
This being my first freelancing project, it pushed me to work differenty and taught me a lot about time management and productivity
Worked on the company's website and its subsidiary branches
Managed a small team of developers to provide backend solutions
